title: Gross domestic product of the Arab world in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
The highest Country Saudi Arabia has 785.34 more GDP in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Comoros.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
Country United Arab Emirates  has the second highest value for GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 785.34 between the maximum Country Saudi Arabia and minimum Country Comoros.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars at Country Saudi Arabia is 786.52 , second place is United Arab Emirates  at 414.18, and thirdly is Egypt at 249.56.
The lowest value 1.18 at Comoros is almost 5.89 times smaller than the average value 133.61.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is 2672.26 if we add up values of all Countrys.
